name: WorksoftExecutionManager
description: Perform automation of Certify Process(es) within Worksoft Execution Manager
author: worksoft

inputs.name: executiontype
inputs.label: Execution Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Do you want to execute a Bookmark, run a list of processes, or a pre-defined request within Execution Manager?

inputs.name: certifydatabase
inputs.label: Certify Database Alias
inputs.helpMarkDown: Certify database alias name specified in Management Studio

inputs.name: processlist
inputs.label: Process Name(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Process(es) complete with folder paths i.e. ["folder1\\folder1a\\process1","folder2\\process2"].

inputs.name: processlistextended
inputs.label: Process Name(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Process(es) complete with folder paths (if using yaml then the key is processlistextended:) i.e. [{
"ProcessPath": "Folder1\\Folder2\\Process1",
"Layout": "optional",
"RecordSet": "optional",
"RecordSetMode": "optional",
"SpecificResourceName": "optional",
"ResultAttributes": [{"Name": "version","Value": "123"}],
"ResourceDataRequirements": [{"Name": "operating system","Value": "Windows 2016"}],
"CertifyParameters": [{"Name": "capturescreenon","Value": "CaptureAllSteps"}]},
{"ProcessPath": "Folder1\\Process2","SpecificResourceName": "optional","ResultAttributes": [],"ResourceRequirements": [],"CertifyParms": []}].

inputs.name: email
inputs.label: Email Address
inputs.helpMarkDown: Email Address for authentication in Execution Manager (user account must belong to only a single tenant)

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password for authentication in Execution Manager; Please utilize secrets within the Azure Key Vault.  The syntax to reference a variable will look like $(variableName)

inputs.name: resultattributeparameters
inputs.label: Result Attribute Values
inputs.helpMarkDown: Values of result attributes to set for execution.  Each result attribute must exist in the Certify database. The syntax for use is {attributeName1}{value1}{attributeName2}{value2}
inputs.visibleRule: executiontype = processes || executiontype = bookmark || executiontype = request

inputs.name: resultfolder
inputs.label: Certify Result Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target Result Folder for execution within Certify.  If it does not exist, it will be created during execution.

OutputVariables.name: overallstatus
OutputVariables.description: Overall status as a whole for all Certify Processes executed

OutputVariables.name: overallexecutionstatus
OutputVariables.description: Overall execution status as a whole for all Certify Processes executed

OutputVariables.name: executionjson
OutputVariables.description: Json describing all the details for each Certify Process
